GSP33brsvbh3u:5: smṛtinyāyaśrutivirodhaparihāreṇa hi anadhyavasāyalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ parihṛtaṃ tathāca prāmāṇye niścalīkṛte tārtīyo vicāro bhavatyanyathā tu nirbījatayā na sidhyediti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:6: avāntarasaṃgatiṃ darśayituntatra ca jīvavyatiriktāni tattvāni jīvopakaraṇānicetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:13: naca śrūyate tasmānna bhūtapariṣvakto raṃhatyapi tu karaṇamātrapariṣvaktaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:24: yathāgnihotrādhikaraṇamāhavanīya evaṃ śraddhāśabdavācyāgnihotrāhutipariṇāmāvasthārūpāḥ sūkṣmā yā āpaḥ śraddhābhāvitāstadadhikaraṇaṃ dyulokaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:26: tena hīddho 'sau dyuloko dīpyate 'taḥ samindhanātsamit tasyādityasya raśmayo dhūmā indhanādivādityādraśmīnāṃ samutthānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:34: parjanyo vāva gautamāgniḥ parjanyo nāma vṛṣṭyupakaraṇābhimānī devatāviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:36: vāyunā hi parjanyo 'gniḥ samidhyate, purovātādiprābalye vṛṣṭidarśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:43: tasmindevā yajamānaprāṇā agnirūpāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati tasya somasyāhutervarṣaṃ bhavati
GSP33brsvbh3u:44: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhākhyā āpo dyulokamāhutitvena praviśya candrākāreṇa pariṇatāḥ satyo dvitīye paryāye parjanyāgnau hutā vṛṣṭitvena pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:46: 'pṛthivī vāva gautamāgniḥ'tasya pṛthivyākhyasyāgnaiḥ saṃvatsara eva samit
GSP33brsvbh3u:47: saṃvatsareṇa kālena hi samiddhā bhūmirvrīhyādiniṣpattaye kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:49: rātrirarciḥ pṛthivyā śyāmāyā anurūpā śyāmatayā rātriragnerivānurupamarciḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:50: diśoṅgārāḥ prage rātrirūpārciḥśamane upaśāntānāṃ prasannānāṃ diśāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:52: tasminnagnau śraddhāsomapariṇāmakrameṇāgatā apo vṛṣṭirūpeṇa pariṇatā devā juhvati tasyā āhuterannaṃ vrīhiyavādi bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:54: vācā khalvayaṃ tālvādyaṣṭasthānasthitayā varṇapadavākyābhivyaktikrameṇārthajātaṃ prakāśayan samidhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:60: tā evāpaḥ śraddhādipariṇāmakrameṇāgatāḥ vrīhyādirūpeḥ pariṇatā satyaḥ puruṣe 'gnau hutāstāsāṃ pariṇāmo retaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:61: yoṣā vāva gautamāgniḥ tasyā upastha eva samit /
GSP33brsvbh3u:62: tena hi sā putrādyutpādanāya samidhyate yadupamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:63: strīsaṃbhavādupamantraṇasya lomāni vā dhūmaḥ yonirarciḥ lohitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:66: tasminnetasminnagnau devā reto juhvati tasyā āhutergarbhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:67: evaṃ śraddhāsomavarṣānnaretohavanakrameṇa yoṣāgniṃ prāpyāpo garbhākhyā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:69: yataḥ pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti tasmādadbhiḥ pariveṣṭito jīvo rahatīti gamyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:70: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhāśabdavācyā āpa ityagre vakṣyati tāsāṃ trivṛtkatatayā tejo 'nnāvinābhāvenābgrahaṇena tejonnayorapi saṃgraha ityetadapi vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:71_0: yadyapyetāvatāpi bhūtaveṣṭitasya jīvasya raṃhaṇaṃ nāvagamyate tejovannānāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau
GSP33brsvbh3u:71_1: puruṣavacastvamātraśravaṇāt, tathāpīṣṭādikāriṇāṃ dhūmādinā pitṛyāṇena pathā candralokaprāptikathanaparayā
GSP33brsvbh3u:72: rāṭ'iti śrutyā saha 'śraddhāṃ juhvati tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavati'ityasyāḥ śruteḥ mānatvādgamyate bhūtapariṣvakto raṃhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:73: tathāhi-yā evāpo hutā dvitīyasyāmāhutau somabhāvaṃ gatāstābhireṣa pariṣvakto jīva iṣṭādikārī candrabhūyaṃ gataścandralokaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:74: nanu svatantrā āpaḥ śraddhādikrameṇa somabhāvamāpnuvantu tābhirapariṣvakta eva tu jīvaḥ sendriyamātro gatvā somabhāvamanubhavatu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:78: evaṃ hi śrutisāmānyaṃ kalpeta yadi yena rūpeṇa yena ca krameṇāpāṃ somabhāvastenaiva jīvasyāpi somabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:81_0: ato dadhipayaḥprabhṛtayo dravabhūyastvādāpo hutāḥ sūkṣmībhūtā iṣṭādikāriṇamāśritā
GSP33brsvbh3u:81_1: nendhanena vidhinā dehe hūyamāne hutāḥ satya āhutimayya iṣṭādikāriṇaṃ pariveṣṭya
GSP33brsvbh3u:82: ayamarthaḥ-evaṃ hi sūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhet yadyasya sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:89: paramātmaiva copādhikalpitāvacchedo jīva ityākhyāyate, tasya ca dehendriyāderupādheḥ prādeśikatvānna tatra san dehāntaraṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:90: tasmātsūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhatikarmopasthāpitaḥ pratipattavyaḥ prāptavyo yo dehastadviṣayāyā bhāvanāyā utpādanāyā dīrghībhāvamātraṃ jalūkayopamīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:94: ālayavijñānasaṃtāna ātmā tasya vṛttiḥ ṣaṭ pravṛttivijñānāni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:100: te hi śarīrātmavādino bhasmībhāvamātmana āhurna kasyacidgamanamiti //1//
GSP33brsvbh3u:109: yastu gandhasvedapākaprāṇāvakāśadānadarśanāddehasya pāñcabhautikatvaṃ paśyaṃstejobannātmakatvena tryātmakatve na parituṣyati, taṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:112: ato na sa deho bhūtāntarāṇi pratyākhyāya kevalābhiradbhirārabdhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:117: prāṇānāṃ jīvaddehe sāśrayatvamavagataṃ gacchati jīvaddehe tadanuvidhāyinaḥ prāṇā api gacchantīti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:119: sa caiṣāmanuvidheyaḥ sūkṣmo deho bhūtendriyamaya iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:123: śrāvite 'pi spaṣṭe jīvasya prāṇaiḥ saha gamane 'gnyādigatiśaṅkā
GSP33brsvbh3u:130: pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvaprakāre pṛṣṭe prathamāyāmāhutau anapāṃ śraddhāyā hotavyatābhidhānasaṃbhaddhamanupapannaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:131: nahi yathā paśvādibhyo hṛdayādayo 'vayavā avadāya niṣkṛṣya hūyante, evaṃ śraddhā buddhiprasādalakṣaṇā niṣkraṣṭuṃ vā hotuṃ vā śakyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:138_1: iraṅgāravisphuliṅgeṣu praśnāḥ ṣaṭ, teṣāṃ yaḥ samāhāraḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sā ṣaṭpraśnī, tasyā
GSP33brsvbh3u:142: kriyāsamabhihāreṇāpyāyanāpakṣayau yathā somasya tathā bhakṣayanti somamayāṃllokānityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:146: yajeta'iti yāgabhāvanāyaḥ kartrapekṣitopāyatārūpavidhiśrutivirodhādannaśabdo bhoktṛṇāmeva satāṃ devopajīvitāmātreṇa bhākto gamayitavyo na tu carvaṇanigaraṇābhyāṃ mukhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:149: yathā hi balīvardādayo bhuñjānā api svaphalaṃ svāmino halādivahanenopakurvāṇā bhogyāḥ, evaṃ paramatattvamavidvāṃsa iṣṭādikāriṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:150: iha dadhipayaḥpuroḍāśādināmuṣmiṃśca loke paricārakatayā devānāmupabhogyā iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:153: yo hi pañcāgnividyāṃ na veda taṃ devā bhakṣayantīti nindyate pañcāgnividyāṃ stotuṃ tasyā eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:164: ca yatkiñceha karma kṛtaṃ tasyāntaṃ prāpyeti śravaṇāt, prāyaṇasya caikapraghaṭṭakena sakalakarmābhivyañjakatvāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:171: tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ityācārameva yoninimittamupadiśati na tu karma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:172_0: stāṃ vā karmaśīle dve apyaviśeṣeṇānuśayastathāpi yadyapyayamiṣṭāpūrtakārī svayaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:178: tathāca niranuśayānāmeva bhuktabhogānāmavaroha iti prāpta ucyate-yena
GSP33brsvbh3u:179: karmakalāpena phalamupabhojitaṃ tasminnatīte 'pi sānuśayā eva candramaṇḍalādavarohanti
GSP33brsvbh3u:189: homaṃ vidhatte nāpi madhyāhnādāvapi tu sāyaṃprātaḥkālāpekṣayā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:196: nahi yāvantaḥ saṃpātā yāvatāṃ vā puṃsāṃ saṃpātāste sarve tatreṣṭādikāriṇā bhogena kṣayaṃ nīyante
GSP33brsvbh3u:201: api ceṣṭāpūrtakārīha janmani kevalaṃ na tanmātramakārṣīdapi tu godohanenāpaḥ praṇayan paśuphalamapyapūrvaṃ samacaiṣīt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:202: evamaharniśaṃ ca vāṅmanaḥ śarīraceṣṭābhiḥ puṇyāpuṇyamihāmutropabhogyaṃ saṃcitavato na martyalokādibhogyaṃ candraloke bhogyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:203: naca svaphalavirodhino 'nuśayasya ṛte prāyaścittādātmajñānādvādattaphalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati
GSP33brsvbh3u:206: anye tu sakalakarmakṣaye parāvṛttiśaṅkā nirbījeti manyamānā anyathādhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrurityāha-kecittāvadāhuriti
GSP33brsvbh3u:210: tatreṣṭādīnāṃ bhogena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvānniranuśayā evānupabhuktakarmavaśādāvartanta iti prāpta ucyate-sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:212: yathā bhāṇḍasthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite 'pi bhāṇḍalepakaṃ taccheṣaṃ madhu vā sarpirvā na kṣālayituṃ śakyamiti dṛṣṭamevaṃ tadanusārādetadapi pratipattavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:214_0: yathā sevako hāstikāśvīyapadātivrātaparivṛto mahārājaṃ sevamānaḥ kālavaśācchatrapādukāvaśeṣo
GSP33brsvbh3u:214_1: na sevitumarhatīti dṛṣṭaṃ tanmūlā ca laukikī smṛtiriti dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ sānuśayā evāvartanta
GSP33brsvbh3u:223: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukhaduḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete /
GSP33brsvbh3u:228: na cābhivyaktaṃ ca karma phalaṃ na datta iti ca saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:230_2: phalopabhogena prakṣayānnāsti teṣāṃ karmāśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:232: kiñca svasamavetameva prāyaṇenābhivyajyate 'pūrvaṃ na parasamavetaṃ, yena pitrādigatena karmaṇā varteranniti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:236: anena niranuśayā evāvarohantīti pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nigūḍhamuddhāṭya nirasyati
GSP33brsvbh3u:243: 'ācārahīnaṃ na punanti vedāḥ'iti hi smṛtyā vedapadena
GSP33brsvbh3u:244: vedārthamupalakṣayantyā vedārthānuṣṭhānaśeṣatvamācārasyoktaṃ na tu svatantra ācāraḥ phalasya sādhanaṃ, tena vedārthānuṣṭhānopakārakatayācārasya nānarthakyaṃ kratvarthasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:256: 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti'iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:257_0: kauṣītakināṃ samāmnānāt, dehārambhasya ca candralokagamanamantareṇānupapatteḥ pañcamyāmāhutāvityāhitisaṃkhyāniyamāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:261: tatsthānatvasaṃbhavādasaṃpūraṇena prativacanopapatteḥ, ananyamārgatayā ca tadbhogavirahiṇāmapi grāmaṃ gacchan
GSP33brsvbh3u:265: 'bhidhīyate-satyaṃ sthānatayāvagatasya na mārgatvaṃ tathāpi vettha yathāsau mārgo na saṃpūryate ityasya prativacanāvasare
GSP33brsvbh3u:267: yadi punastenaiva mārgeṇāgatya janmamaraṇaprabandhavat sthānamadhyāsīta naitattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:268: nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyāṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ pratipadyamānāstṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:271: tadyadi kṣudrajantavo 'pyanenaiva pathāvaroheyuḥ, naitadeṣāṃ janmamaraṇaprabandhavattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:272: tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:273: tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca'itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:301: yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi tādātmya evāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:303: manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:305: gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:308: samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:313: yadi tu devājagaśarīre samasamaye syātāṃ na devaśarīramajagaraśarīraṃ śilpiśatenāpi kriyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:314: nahi dadhipayasī samasamaye parasparātmanī śakye saṃpādayituṃ, tathehāpi sūkṣmaśarīrākāśayoryugapadbhāvānna parasparātmatvaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:317: nanvākāśabhāvena saṃyogamātraṃ lakṣyatāṃ kiṃ sādṛśyenetyata āha-vibhutvāccākāśeneti //22//
GSP33brsvbh3u:320: 'durniṣprapataram'iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇaṃ brūte na tu vilambeneti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33brsvbh3u:321: vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ na sūkṣmaśarīre duḥkhabhāgīti durniṣprapataraṃ vilambaṃ lakṣayatīti rāddhāntaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:324: ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā oṣādhivanaspatayastilabhāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:327: tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti vrīhyādiśarīrā evānuśayina iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:328: naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva yatsaṃparkamātramiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:332: sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:333: nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:336: kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:337: tenāstu niṣedhādasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutā vidheścha kratvarthatā ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:340: tasmājjanermukhyārthatvādvrīhyādiśarīrā anuśayino jāyanta iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā
GSP33brsvbh3u:344: naca tadgatāyāḥ paśuhiṃsāyā 'na hiṃsyāt'iti niṣedhātkratvarthāyā api duḥkhaphalavatsaṃbhavaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:346: tathāhi-na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:347: na caitat 'nānṛtaṃ vadet' 'na tau paśau karoti'itivatkasyacitprakaraṇe
GSP33brsvbh3u:350: paśau niṣiddhayorājyabhāgayoḥ kratvarthatvena niṣedhasyāpi kratvarthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:354: kevalaṃ tasya rāgataḥ prāptatvāttadanuvādena nañarthaṃ vidhirupasaṃkrāmati, tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:355: tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate-yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:356: kratvarthasyāpi ca niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:357: naca dṛṣṭe puruṣokārakatve pratyarthini sati tatkalpanāspadam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:358: naca svātantryapāratantrye sati saṃyogapṛthaktve khādiratādivadekatra saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:364: vrīhyādibhāvamāpannāḥ khalvanuśayinaḥ puruṣairupabhuktā retaḥ sigbhāvamanubhavantī śrūyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:366_0: vrīhyādidehatve hi vrīhyādiṣu lūneṣvavahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca vrīhyādidehavināśādanuśayinaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:366_1: pravaseyuriti kathamanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāvaḥ saṃsargamātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhyādiṣu
GSP33brsvbh3u:366_2: naṣṭeṣvapi na saṃsargiṇo 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti retaḥsigbhāva upapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:372: sadyo jāto hi bālo na retaḥ sigbhavatyapi tu cirajātaḥ prauḍhayauvanaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:375: tatkimidānīṃ sarvatraivānuśayināṃ saṃsargamātraṃ tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇā ityādiṣu tathābhāva āpadyeteti netyāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:378: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh3u:379: // iti tṛtīyādhyāyasya gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyanirūpaṇākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh3u:383: idānīṃ tu tasyaiva jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvasiddhyartha prapañcayate-kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:384: yadyapi brahmaṇo 'nyasyānirvācyatayā jāgratsvapnāvasthāgatayorubhayorapi sargayormāyamayatvaṃ tathāpi yathā jāgratsṛṣṭirbrahmātmabhāvasākṣātkārātprāganuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:386: evaṃ kiṃ svapnasṛṣṭirāhosvit pratidinameva nivartata iti vimarśārthaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh3u:392: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-iha hi sarvāṇyeva mithyājñānānyudāharaṇaṃ teṣāṃ satyatvaṃ pratijñāyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:396: atathātvasya tvapratīyamānasya tathābhāvaprameyavirodhena kalpanāspadatvāt bādhakapratyayādatathātvamiti cet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:402: yathāhi kṣīraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kālāntare dadhi bhavati, evaṃ rajataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:405: yadyasya tīvrātapaklāntisahitaṃ cakṣuḥ sa tasya rajatarūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:406: yasya tu kevalamālokamātropakṛtaṃ, sa tasyaiva śuktirūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:407: evamutpalamapi nīlalohitaṃ divā saurībhirbhābhirabhivyaktaṃ nīlatayā gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:409: evamasatyāṃ nidrāyāṃ sato 'pi rathādīnna gṛhṇāti nidrāṇastu gṛhṇātīti sāmagrībhedādvā kālabhedādvā virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:416: imamarthaṃ śrutirapi darśayati-'atha rathān rathayogān pathaḥ sṛjate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:417: naca 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti'iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:419: sṛjata iti hi śruterbahuśrutisaṃvādātpramāṇāntarasaṃvādācca balīyastvena tadanuguṇatayā na tatra rathā ityasyā bhāktatvena vyākhyānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:420: jāgradavasthādarśanayogyā na santi na tu rathā na santīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:427: tadyathā svapne śuklāmbaradharaḥ śuklamālyānulepano brāhmaṇāyanaḥ priyavrataṃ pratyāha-priyavrata, pañcame 'hani
GSP33brsvbh3u:429: sa ca jāgrattathātmano mānamanubhūya svapnapratyayaṃ satyamabhimanyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:437: na tāvat kṣīrasyeva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:438: nahi jātvīśvaragṛhe cirasthitānyapi rajatabhājanāni śuktibhāvamanubhavanti dṛśyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:439: na cetarasya rajatānubhavasamaye 'nyo 'nākulendriyo na tasya śuktibhāvamanubhavati pratyeti ca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:442: pāramārthike hyāsya toyabhāve tatsādhyāmudānyopaśamalakṣaṇārthakriyāṃ kuryānmarīcisādhyāmapi rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:445: tadarthakriyākāritvavyāptaṃ toyatvaṃ mātrayāpi tāmakurvattoyameva na syāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:448: tathāhi-asamarthavidhāpāti toyametaditi manvāno na tṛṣṇayāpi marīcitoyamabhidhāvet yathā marīcīnanubhavan
GSP33brsvbh3u:450: kimaparāddhaṃ marīciṣu toyaviparyāsena sarvajanīnena yattamatilaṅghya viparyāsāntaraṃ kalpyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:452: tatrāpi rajatajñānaṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ bādhyamuttaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ śuktijñānaṃ prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:453: rajatajñānātprākprāpakābhāvena śukteraprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhasaṃbhavātpūrvajñānaprāptaṃ tu rajataṃ śuktijñānamapabādhitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:457: naca vartamānarajatāvabhāsi jñānaṃ bhaviṣyattāmasyāgocarayanna bhaviṣyatā svasamayavartinīṃ śuktiṃ gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate, kālabhedena virodhābhāvāditi yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:458: mā nāmāsya jñāsītpratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyattāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi tvanumānamupakārabhāvahetumivāsati vināśapratyayopanipāte sthemānamākalayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:460: tathāca rajatagocaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ vastutaḥ sthirameva rajataṃ gocarayet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:461: tathāca bhaviṣyacchuktikājñānakālaṃ, rajataṃ vyāpnuyāditi virodhācchuktijñānena bādhyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:467: yadi cirasthāyitvaṃ yogyatā na sā pratyakṣagocaraḥ śakteratīndriyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:468: atha kālāntaravyāpitvaṃ, tadapyayuktaṃ, kālāntareṇa bhaviṣyatendriyasya saṃyogāyogāttadupahitasīmno vyāpitvasyātīndriyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:470: tasmādatyantābhyāsavaśena pratyakṣānantaraṃ śīghratarotpannavinaśyadavasthānumānasahitapratyakṣābhiprāyameva cirasthāyīti gṛhyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:476: yattu satyaṃ svapnadarśanamuktaṃ tatrāpyākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanenākhyāte saṃvādābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:481: rajanīsamaye 'pi hi bhāratādvarṣāntare ketumālādau vāsaro bhavatīti bhārate varṣa ityuktam
GSP33brsvbh3u:489: prājñavyāpāratvena pāramārthikatvānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhakapratyayena virudhyamānaṃ nātmānaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:492: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau |
GSP33brsvbh3u:499: iha hi nāḍīpuritatparamātmāno jīvasya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ sthānatvena śrūyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:503: yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:504: avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:508: ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:509: tayā hi tāvadeṣa jīvastadavasthāno bhavati kevalam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:510: tattvajñānābhāvena samūlakāṣamavidyāyā akāṣājjāgratsvapnalakṣaṇaṃ jīvasya vyutthānaṃ bhavati
GSP33brsvbh3u:512: kiṃ tāvaprāptaṃ, nāḍīpurītatparamātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:513: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣveko narendraḥ kadācitkvacinnilīyate kadācitkvacidevameko jīvaḥ kadācinnāḍīṣu kadācitpurītati kadācidbrahmaṇīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:514_0: yathā nirapekṣā vrīhiyavāḥ kratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśaprakṛtitayā śrutā ekārthā vikalpyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:514_1: evaṃ saptamīśrutyā vāyatanaśrutyā vekanilayanārthāḥ parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi
GSP33brsvbh3u:514_2: vikalpamarhanti yatrāpi nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍīpurītatoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam
GSP33brsvbh3u:514_3: 'tathā tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:515: athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti nāḍībrahmaṇorādhārayoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:516: prāṇaśabdaṃ ca brahma 'athāsmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati'nnirapekṣayoravedhāratvam
GSP33brsvbh3u:519: evaṃ tābhireva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācidbrahmaivādhāra iti siddhamādhāratve nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāmanapekṣatvam
GSP33brsvbh3u:521: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-jīvaḥ samuccayenaivaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpena /
GSP33brsvbh3u:526: prakṛtakratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśadravyaprakṛtitayā hi parasparānapekṣau vrīhiyavau vihitauśakrutaścaitau pratyekaṃ puroḍāśamabhinirvartayitum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:530: sa hi yathā vihitānyaṅgānyabhisamīkṣya pravartamāno naitānyanyathayitaṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:534: na cāṅgabhūtaindravāyavādigrahānurodhena yathā pradhānasya somayāgasyāvṛttirevamatrāpīti yuktam
GSP33brsvbh3u:538_1: saṃskārā vidhīyante, natu somayāgoddeśenendravāyvādayo devatāścodyante, yena tāsāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:541: naca yāvanmātramekamūrdhvapātraṃ vyāpnoti tāvanmātraṃ gṛhītvā pariśiṣṭaṃ tyajyeteti yujyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:543: evaṃ taddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavedyadi tatsarvaṃ yāga upayujyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:545: tasmātsakalasya somarasasya yāgaśeṣatvena saṃskārārhatvādekaikena ca grahaṇena sakalasya saṃskartumaśakyatvāttadavayavasyaikena
GSP33brsvbh3u:547: ata eva samuccayadarśanaṃ 'daśautānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahan
GSP33brsvbh3u:552: teṣāṃ ca samuccaye sati yāvadyaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ tāvattasyai devatāyai tyaktavyamityarthādyāgasyāvṛttyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:553: yadi punaḥ pṛthakkṛtānyapyekīkṛtya kāñcana devatāmuddiśya tyajeran,
GSP33brsvbh3u:562: sā coktā bhāṣyakṛtā-yatrāpi nirapekṣā iva nāḍīḥ suptisthānatvena śrāvayatītyādinā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:565: nanu yadi brahmaiva nilayanasthānaṃ tāvanmātramucyatāṃ kṛtaṃ nāḍyupanyāsenetyata āha-apicātreti
GSP33brsvbh3u:570: pittenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānvedeti taddvārā sukhaduḥkhābhāvena tatkāraṇapāpmāsparśena nāḍīstutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:571: yadā tu tejo brahma tadā sugamam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:572: apica nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhyādhāra eva bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:575: tathāhi-nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhīnāṃ karaṇānāmāśrayo jīvastu brāhmāvyatirekātsvamahipratiṣṭhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:577: vikalpa tu vyatirekaṃ brahmaṇa ādhāratvamucyate jīvaṃ prati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:578: tathāca suṣuptāvasthāyāmupādhīnāmasamudācārājjīvasya brahmātmatvameva brahmādhāratvaṃ na tu nāḍīpurītādhāratvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:579: tadupādhikaraṇamātrādhāratayā tu suṣuptadaśārambhāya jīvasya nāḍīpurītadādhāratvamityatulyārthatayā na vikalpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:585: na ceyamātmatādātmyaṃ vinā nāḍyādiṣu paramātmavyatirikteṣu sthāneṣūpapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:586: tatra hi sthito 'yaṃ jīva ātmavyatirekābhimānī sannavaśyaṃ viśeṣajñānavān bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:597: aupādhike tu paricchede yatropādhisaṃnihitastanmātraṃ na jānīyānna tu sarvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:599: tasmātsarvaviśeṣavijñānapratyastamayīṃ suṣuptiṃ prasādayata tadāsya sarvopādhyupasaṃhāro vaktavyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:604: naca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ jīvasya svarūpeṇa nāḍyādisthānatvapratipādane kiñcitprayojanaṃ brahmabhūyapratipādane tvasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:605: tasmānna samapradhānabhāvena samuccayo nāpi vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:613: sa vānyo veti īśvaro veti saṃbhavamātreṇopanyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:616: yaddhi dvyahādinirvartanīyamekasya puṃsaścoditaṃ karma tasya pūrvedyuranuṣṭhitasyāsti smṛtiriti vaktavye 'nuḥ pratyabhijñānasūcanārthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:620: jīvaḥ pratinyāyaṃ saṃprasāde suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ vṛddhāntāyādravati āgacchati pratiyoni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:621: yohi vyāghrayoniḥ suṣupto buddhāntamāgacchan sa vyāghra eva bhavati na jātyantaram /
GSP33brsvbh3u:622: tadidamuktam-ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho veti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:624: yo hi jīvaḥ suptaḥ sa śarīrāntara uttiṣṭhati śarīrāntaragatastu suptajīvasaṃbandhini śarīra uttiṣṭhati, tataśca na śarīrāntare
GSP33brsvbh3u:626: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:630: evamanādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedopādhikalpito jīvo na vastutaḥ paramātmano bhidyate tadupādyudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ codbhūta ityabhibhūta iva pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:631: tataśca suṣuptādāvapi abhibhūta iva jāgradavasthādiṣūdbhūta iva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:632: tasya cāvidyātadvāsanopādheranāditayā kāryakāraṇabhāvena pravahataḥ suvivecatayā tadupahito jīvaḥ suviveca iti //9//
GSP33brsvbh3u:638: tadyathā kaścitsuptotthitaḥ prāha sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ laghūni me gātrāṇi prasannaṃ me mana iti, kaścitpunarduḥkhamasvāpsaṃ gurūṇi me gātrāṇi bhramatyanavasthitaṃ me mana iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:643: yadyapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamena mohasuṣuptayoḥ sāmyaṃ tathāpi naikyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:645: bāhyendriyavyāpārabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tu bhede tayoḥ suṣuptamohayorapi prayojanabhedātkāraṇabhedāllakṣaṇabhedācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:648: yadyapi satyapi mohe na maraṇaṃ tathāpyasati mohe na maraṇamiti maraṇārtho mohaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:649: musalasaṃpātādinimittatvānmohasya śramādinimittatvācca suṣuptasya mukhanetrādivikāralakṣaṇatvānmohasya prasannavadanatvādilakṣaṇabhedācca suṣuptasyāsuṣuptasya tvavāntarabhede 'pi
GSP33brsvbh3u:651: tasmāt suṣuptamohāvasthayorbrahmaṇā saṃpattāvapi suṣupte yādṛśī saṃpattirna tādṛśī moha ityardhasaṃpattiruktā
GSP33brsvbh3u:658_1: tathāpi prapañcaliṅgānāṃ bahvīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ darśanādbhavati punarvicikitsā atastannivāraṇāyārambhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:664: tasmādubhayaliṅgakaśāstraprāmāṇyādubhayarūpatā brahmaṇaḥ pāramārthikīti prāpta ucyate-na sthānata upādhito 'pi parasya brahmaṇa ubhayacihnatvasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:666: pāramārthikatve hyupādhijanitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:678: na bhedād iti cen na pratyekam atadvacanāt |
GSP33brsvbh3u:698: kiṃ sāllakṣaṇaṃ ca prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ ca brahma kiṃ sallakṣaṇameva brahmota prakāśalakṣaṇameveti tatra pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti-prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:703: nahi sattvaṃ nāma prakāśarūpādanyat, yathā sarvagandhatvādayo 'pi tu prakāśarūpameva saditi nobhayarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:706: bhede na sthānato 'pīti nirākṛtamiti nādhikaraṇāntaraṃ prayojayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:708: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati ' arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt' iti vinigamanakāraṇavacanamanavakāśaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:709: evaṃ hi tasyāvakāśaḥ syādyāda kāścidupāsanāparatayā rūpamācakṣīran kāścinnīrūpabrahmapratipādanaparā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:710: sarvāsāṃ tu pravilayārthatvena nīrūpabrahmapratipādanārthatve ukto vinigamanaheturna syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:715: vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa ivāgnisaṃyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:717: na tāvadvāstavaḥ sarvasādhāraṇaḥ pṛthivyādiprapañcaḥ puruṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ samucchettum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:718: apica prahlādaśukādibhiḥ puruṣadhaureyaiḥ samūlamunmūlitaḥ prapañca iti śūnyaṃ jagadbhavet
GSP33brsvbh3u:721: samāropitarūpastu prapañco brahmatattvajñāpanaparaireva vākyairbrahmatattvamavabodhayadbhiḥ śakyaḥ samucchettumiti kṛtamatra vidhinā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:722: nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:723: na cāsyātmajñānavidhiṃ vinā vedāntārthabrahmatattvāvabodho na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:724: maulikasya svādhyāyādhyayanavidhereva vivakṣitārthatayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhanaparatāmāpādayato vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:728: tasmāt 'jartilayavāgvā juhuyāt'itivadvidhisarūpā ete 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavya'ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:731: apica brahmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcamuktaṃ na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścitsaṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:732: jīvo hi niyojyo bhavet, sa cetprapañcapakṣe vartate ko niyojyastasyocchinnatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:746: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva ca paryavasyatyāmnāye yadabhyupagataṃbhavadbhiḥ śāstraparyālocanayāniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasyeti tadetacchāstrāvirodhādapramāṇakam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:747: athaitacchāstramaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvaṃ ca niyuktaṃ tato dvyarthaṃ ca viruddhārthaṃ ca syādityāha-atheti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:750: nahi tadvākyaṃ tasya niyojyatāmāhāpi tu laukikapramāṇasiddhāṃ niyojyatāmāśritya darśapūrṇamāsau vidhatte /
GSP33brsvbh3u:751: idaṃ tu niyojyatāmapanayati ca niyuṅkte ceti durghaṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:753: paurvāparyālocanayā vedāntānāṃ tattvaniṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoganiṣṭhatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:762: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ |
GSP33brsvbh3u:764: dve eva brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthato 'rūpasyādhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyāṃ hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:767: atra pṛthivyaptejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇo rūpaṃ mūrtaṃ mūrcchitāvayavamitaretarānupraviṣṭāvayavaṃ kaṭhinamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:773: tasyaitasya brahmarūpasya tejo 'bannasya caturviśeṣaṇasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāro ya eṣa savitā tapati
GSP33brsvbh3u:778: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa etasmin savitṛmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:779: karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇāhvayastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ sāro nityaparokṣatā ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam
GSP33brsvbh3u:780_1: mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ sato hyoṣa
GSP33brsvbh3u:780_2: rasa iti athāmūrtaṃ prāṇaśca yaścāyamantarātmannākāśa etadamṛtametadyadetattyaṃ tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:782: liṅgasya hi karaṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇamakṣyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śruteradhigatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:783: tadevaṃ brahmaṇa aupādhikayormūrtāmūrtayorādhyātmikādhidaivikayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ sattyacchabdavācyayoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:784: athedānīṃ tasya karaṇātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:788: tadevaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ savāsanaṃ satyarūpamuktvā yattatsatyasya satyamuktaṃ brahma tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:789: yataḥ satyasya rūpaṃ niḥśeṣamuktamato 'vaśiṣṭaṃ satyasya yatsatyaṃ tasyānantaraṃ taduktihetukaṃ svarūpaṃ vaktavyamityāha-athāta
GSP33brsvbh3u:796: atraivamarthenetinā yatsaṃnihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭaṃ tanniṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitaṃ ca mūrtāmūrtaṃ savāsanaṃ rūpadvayam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:798: tatredaṃ vicāryate-kiṃ rūpadvayaṃ savāsanaṃ brahma ca sarvameva ca
GSP33brsvbh3u:799: pratiṣidhyate, uta brahmaivātha savāsanaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:800: yadyapi teṣu teṣu vedāntapradeśeṣu brahmasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ tadasadbhāvajñānaṃ ca ninditam
GSP33brsvbh3u:801: 'astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ'iti cāsya sattvamavadhāritaṃ tathāpi sadbodharūpaṃ tadbrahma savāsanamūrtāmūrtarūpasādhāraṇatayā ca sāmānyaṃ tasya caite viśeṣā mūrtāmūrtādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:805: ata eva nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamastīti niṣedhāt paraṃ nāstīti sarvaniṣedhameva tattvamāha śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:813: brahmaṇastu vāṅmanasāgocaratayā sakalapramāṇavirahāt, katarasyāstu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañcapratiṣedhe
GSP33brsvbh3u:814: brahmapratiṣedhe tvavyākopādbrahmaiva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogyatvānna prapañcastadvaiparītyāt, vīpsā tu tadatyantābhāvasūcanāyeti madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:815: tatra prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākaroti-na tāvadubhayapratiṣedha upapadyate śūnyavādaprasaṅgāditi
GSP33brsvbh3u:816: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-upādhayo hyamī pṛthivyādayo 'vidyākalpitā na tu śoṇakarkādaya iva viśeṣā aśvatvasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:824: tadidamuktam-apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva paramārthatvāpatteḥ pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:829: tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /
GSP33brsvbh3u:830: naca paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddhasvabhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:837: upakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā hi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāmeva brahmaparatvamupapāditaṃ prathame 'dhyāye /
GSP33brsvbh3u:838: na cāsatyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ dūratarasthena pratiṣedhenaiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:839: yacca vāṅmanasātītatayā brahmaṇastatpratiṣedhasya na pramāṇāntaravirodha iti tatrāha-vāṅmanasātītatvamapīti
GSP33brsvbh3u:843: tasmādvedāntavācā manasi saṃnidhānādbrahmaṇo vāṅmanasātītatvaṃ nāñjasamapi tu pratipādanaprakriyopakrama eṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:844: yathā gavādayo viṣayāḥ sākṣācchṛṅgagrāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca naivaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:846: nanu prakṛtapratiṣedhe brahmaṇo 'pi kasmānna pratiṣedha ityata āha-taddhi
GSP33brsvbh3u:848: pradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ prapañcaśca pradhānaṃ na brahma tasya ṣaṣṭhyantatayā prapañcāvacchedakatvenāpradhānatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:849: tato 'nyadbravītīti neti netīti pratiṣedhādanyadbhūyo bravītīti tannirvacanam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:850: nahyetasmādityasya yadā nahyetasmāditi neti netyādiṣṭādbrahmaṇo 'nyatparamastīti vyākhyānaṃ tadā prapañcapratiṣedhādanyadbrahmaiva
GSP33brsvbh3u:852: yadā tu nahyetasmāditi sarvanāmnā pratiṣedho brahmaṇa ādeśaḥ parāmṛśyate tadāpi prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ na pratipattavyamapi tu tena pratiṣedhena bhāvarūpaṃ brahmopalakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:853: kasmādityata āha-tato bravīti ca bhūya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:855: atha brahmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ nāma satyasya satyamiti tadvyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-'prāṇā
GSP33brsvbh3u:858: tat khalu satyamitarāpekṣayā tasyāpi paraṃ satyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:859: tadevaṃ yataḥ pratiṣedhasya parastādbravīti tasmānna prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ brahmāpi tu bhāvarūpamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:860: tadevaṃ pūrvasmin vyākhyāne nirvacanaṃ bravītīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:872: kuṇḍalādirūpeṇa tu bheda ityuktaṃ tena viṣayabhedādbhedābhedayoravirodha ityekaviṣayatvena vā sarvadopalabdheravirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:873: viruddhamiti hi naḥ kva saṃpratyayo na yatpramāṇenopalabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:874: āgamataśca pramāṇādekagocarāvapi bhedābhedau pratīyamānau na virodhamāvahataḥ savitṛprakāśayoriva
GSP33brsvbh3u:882: kuṇḍalatvena bheda iti, sa evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:884: yadi bhinne, ahitvakuṇḍalatve bhinne iti vaktavyaṃ na tu vastunastābhyāṃ bhedābhedau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:887: atha vastuno na bhidyete ahitvakuṇḍalatve tathā sati ko bhedābhedayorviṣayabhedastayorvastuno 'nanyatvenābhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:888: na caikaviṣayatve 'pi sadānubhūyamānatvādbhedābhedayoravirodhaḥ svarūpaviruddhayorapyavirodhe kva nāma virodho vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:891: prapañcitaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra iti neha prapañcitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:896: yathāha śrutiḥ-'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:908: tadyathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā avayavā iva kalāḥ sa prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:909: etadupāsanāyāṃ prakāśavān mukhyo bhavatīti prakāśavān pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:910: athāparāḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra iti catasraḥ kalā eṣa dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma
GSP33brsvbh3u:913: athāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmānnāma pādastṛtīyastadupāsanājjyotiṣmān bhavatīti jyotiṣmān pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:914: atha ghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kalāścaturthaḥ pāda āyatanavānnāma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:915: ete ghrāṇādayo hi gandhādiviṣayā mana āyatanamāśritya bhogasādhanaṃ bhavantītyāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:927: yathā hi tantavaḥ paṭaṃ vidhārayanti tadupādānatvādevaṃ brahmāpi jagadvidhārayati tadupapādakatvāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:935: manaso brahmapratīkasya samāropitabrahmabhāvasya vāgghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramiti catvāraḥ pādāḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:936: mano hi vaktavyaghrātavyadraṣṭavyaśrotavyān gocarān vāgādibhiḥ saṃcaratīti saṃcaraṇasādhāraṇatayā manasaḥ pādastadidamadhyātman /
GSP33brsvbh3u:937: ākāśasya brahmapratīkasyāgnirvāyurādityo diśa iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:938: te hi vyāpino nabhasa udara iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalakṣyanta iti pādāstadidamadhidaivatam
GSP33brsvbh3u:939: tadanena pādavaditi vaidikaṃ nidarśanaṃ vyākhyāya laukikaṃ cedaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:947: yathā saudhajālamārganiveśinyaḥ savitṛbhāso jālamārgopādhibhedādbhinnā bhāsante tadvigame tu gabhastimaṇḍalenaikībhavantyatastena saṃbadhyanta evamihāpīti //34//
GSP33brsvbh3u:950: ekībhāvaḥ kasmādiha saṃbandhaḥ kathañcidvyākhyāyate na mukhya evetyetatsūtreṇa pariharati-
GSP33brsvbh3u:953: svabhāvaścedanena saṃbandhatvena spṛṣṭastataḥ svābhāvikastādātmyānnātiricyata iti tarkapāda upapāditamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:954: tathā bhedo 'pi trividho vānyādṛśaḥ svābhāvika ityarthaḥ //35//
GSP33brsvbh3u:960: brahmādvaitasiddhāvapi na sarvagatatvaṃ sarvavyāpitā sarvasya brahmaṇā svarūpeṇa rūpavattvaṃ sidhyatītyata āha-anena
GSP33brsvbh3u:961: setvādinirākaraṇenaparahetunirākaraṇenānyapratiṣedhasamāśrayaṇena ca svasādhanopanyāsena ca sarvagatatvamapyātmanaḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:962: advaite siddhe sarvo 'yamanirvacanīyaḥ prapañcāvabhāso brahmādhiṣṭhāna iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:968: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ kuta īśvaratvaṃ kutaśca phalahetutvamapītyata āha-tasyaiva brahmaṇo vyāvahārikyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:976: atha karmaṇa eva phalaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyata
GSP33brsvbh3u:979: upāttamapi phalaṃ bhoktumayogyatvādvā karmāntarapratibandhādvā na bhujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:981: nahi svarga ātmānaṃ labhatāmityadhikāriṇaḥ kāmayante kintu bhogyo
GSP33brsvbh3u:983: tena yādṛśamebhiḥ kāmyate tādṛśasya phalatvamiti bhogyameva satphalamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:984: naca tādṛśaṃ karmānantaramiti kathaṃ phalaṃ, tadapi svarūpeṇa /
GSP33brsvbh3u:985: apica svarganarakau tīvratame sukhaduḥkhe iti tadviṣayeṇānubhavena bhogāparanāmnāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam
GSP33brsvbh3u:986: tasmādanubhavayogye ananubhūyamāne śaśaśṛṅgavanna sta iti niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:990: yadyadacetanaṃ tattatsarvaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ pravartata iti pratyakṣāgamābhyāmavadhāritam
GSP33brsvbh3u:1000: nanu 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ phalaṃ prati na sādhanatayā yāgaṃ vidadhati
GSP33brsvbh3u:1001: tathāhi-yadi yāgādaya eva kriyā na tadatiriktā bhāvanā tathāpi ta eva
GSP33brsvbh3u:1002: svapadebhyaḥ pūrvāparībhūtāḥ sādhyasvabhāvā avagamyanta iti na sādhyāntaramapekṣanta iti na svargeṇa sādhyāntareṇa saṃbaddhumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1003_0: athāpi tadatirekiṇī bhāvānāsti tathāpyasau bhāvyāpekṣāpi svapadopāttaṃ pūrvāvagataṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1003_1: na bhāvyaṃ dhātvarthamapahāya na bhinnapadopāttaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca svargādi bhāvyatayā
GSP33brsvbh3u:1003_2: svīkartumarhati na caikasmin vākye sādhyadvayasaṃbandhasaṃbhavaḥ, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1004: na kevalaṃ śabdato vastutaśca puruṣaprayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāddhātvartha eva sādhyo na tu svargādistasya tadavyāpyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1005: svargādestu nāmapadābhidheyatayā siddharūpasyākhyātavācyaṃ sādhyaṃ dhātvarthaṃ prati 'bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate'iti nyāyātsādhanatayā guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1008_0: tathāca karmaṇo yāgāderduḥkhatvena puruṣeṇāsamīhitatvāt, samīhitasya ca svargāderasādhyatvānna
GSP33brsvbh3u:1008_1: yāgādayaḥ puruṣasyopakurvantyanupakāriṇāṃ caiṣāṃ na puruṣa īṣṭe anīśānaśca na teṣu
GSP33brsvbh3u:1016: niṣedhavākyāni ca sākṣādeva pravṛttiniṣedhena vidhivākyāni cānyāni
GSP33brsvbh3u:1017: 'sāṃgrahaṇyā yajeta grāmakāmaḥ'ityādīni na sāṃgrahaṇyādipravṛttiparāṇyapi tūpāyāntaropadeśena sevādidṛṣṭopāyapratiṣedhārthāni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1018: yathā viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣava māsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1021: tanniṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānamādadhacchāstraṃ śāstraṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1023: kathaṃ tarhi vidhiḥ kimatra kathaṃ pravartanāmātratvādvidhestasya cādhikāramantareṇāpyupapatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1024: nahi yo yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvo 'dhikṛtamapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1025: pavanādeḥ pravartakasya tadanapekṣatvāditiśaṅkāmapācikīrṣurāha-tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1032: na tvajñānādiriva niyoktṛprayojanastatrābhiprāyasya pravartakatvāt, tasya cāpauruṣeye 'saṃbhavāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:1040: na caite sākṣādbhāvanābhāvyā api kartrapekṣitasādhanatāvidhyupahitamaryādā bhāvanoddeśyā bhavitumarhanti, yena puṃsāmanupakārakāḥ santo
GSP33brsvbh3u:1049: phalasya sākṣādbhāvanāvyāpyatvavirahiṇo 'pi taduddeśyatayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānātsvargasādhane yāgādau svargakāmāderadhikāra iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1050: na cāprāptārthaviṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇyādiyāgavidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakā niyāmakā vā bhavitumarhanti
GSP33brsvbh3u:1051: na cādhikārābhāve dehātmapravilayo vādhikāribhedapravilayo vā śakya upapādayitum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1053: svarasataḥ pratīyamāner'the vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpātāyātaparatvamucitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1061: etaduktaṃ bhavati-karmaṇo hi phalaṃ prati yatsādhanatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1063: naca vyāpāravati satyeva vyāpāro nāsatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1065: asatyapi ca tailapānakarmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyāmantarā tailapariṇāmabhedānāṃ tadavāntaravyāpāratvāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:1066: tasmātkarmakāryamapūrvaṃ karmaṇā phale kartavye tadavāntaravyāpāra iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1067: yadā punaḥ phalopajananānyathānupapattyā kiñcitkalpyate tadāphalasya vā pūrvāvasthā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1074: nahi jātu mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādayaḥ kumbhakārādyanadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbhādyārambhāya vibhavavanto dṛṣṭāḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1076_0: tasmādacetanaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā na cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ svakāryaṃ pravartitumutsahate
GSP33brsvbh3u:1077_1: cetanādhiṣṭhānādacetanānāṃ kāryārambhakatvamiti tathā caitanyaṃ devatāyā asati bādhake
GSP33brsvbh3u:1077_2: śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇaprasiddhaṃ na śakyaṃ pratiṣedhdhumityapi spaṣṭaṃ niraṭaṅki
GSP33brsvbh3u:1079: tadiha kevalaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā cetanānadhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ phalaṃ prasūta iti dṛṣṭaviruddham
GSP33brsvbh3u:1080: yathā vinaṣṭaṃ karma na phalaṃ prasūta iti kalpyate dṛṣṭavirodhādevamihāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1081: tathā devapūjātmako yāgo devatāṃ naprasādayan phalaṃ prasūta ityapi dṛṣṭaviruddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1087: naca śubhāśubhakāriṇāṃ tadanurūpaṃ phalaṃ prasuvānā devatā dveṣapakṣapātavatīti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1088: nahi rājā sādhukāriṇamanugṛhṇannigṛhṇan vā pāpakāriṇaṃ bhavati dviṣṭo rakto vā tadvadalaukiko 'pīśvaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1089: yathā ca paramāpūrve kartavye utpattyapūrvāṇāmaṅgāpūrvāṇāṃ copayogaḥ /

GSP33brsvbh3u:1125_2: samaśiṣṭatayā sahasradakṣiṇayā saha vikalpopapatteḥ, prakṛtasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya

GSP33brsvbh3u:1135: bhede 'pi ca prathamaṃ saṃjñāntareṇollikhite yajiśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ karmanāmadheyatāmātratāmāvahati natu saṃjñāntaropajanitāṃ bhedadhiyamapanetumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1138: bhavatu saṃjñāntarātkarmabhedaḥ prastute tu kimāyātamityata āha-

GSP33brsvbh3u:1141: na cāsti viśeṣo yato granthe mukhyāvijñāne gauṇī bhavet /

GSP33brsvbh3u:1146: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho yathā
GSP33brsvbh3u:1151: atredaṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ pūrvasminneva karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇo vidhīyate uta
GSP33brsvbh3u:1154: na cotpattiśiṣṭamikṣāguṇāvarodhāttatra vājinamalabdhāvakāśaṃ karmāntaraṃ gocarayatīti yuktam
GSP33brsvbh3u:1155: ubhayorapi vākyayoḥ samasamayapravṛtterāmikṣāvājinayorutpattau samaṃ śiṣyamāṇatvena nāmikṣāyāḥ śiṣṭatvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1157: na ca vaiśvadevītyatra śrauta āmikṣāsaṃbandho viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ yena vājinasaṃbandhādvākyagamyādbalavānbhavedubhayorapi padāntarāpekṣapratītitayā vākyagamyatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1159: astu vā śrautatvaṃ tathāpi vājibhya iti padaṃ vājamannamāmikṣā tadeṣāmastīti vyutpattyā tatsaṃbandhino viśvāndevānupalakṣayati /

GSP33brsvbh3u:1300: tasmādyathā naimittikaṃ karma sakalāṅgavadvihitamapi aśaktau yāvacchakyamaṅgamanuṣṭhātuṃ tāvanmātrajanyenopakāreṇaupakṛtaṃ bhavatyevamihāpyaṅgāntarāvidhānādeva bhaviṣyatīti /

GSP33brsvbh3u:1313: tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ /

GSP33brsvbh3u:1338: ekatrodgātṛtvenocyate prāṇa ekatra codgānatvena kriyākartrośca sphuṭo bheda ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brsvbh3u:1347: bahutarapratyabhijñāne 'pi upakramabhedāttanurodhena copasaṃhāravarṇanādekasminvākye tasyaiva codgīthasya punaḥpunaḥ saṃkīrtanāllakṣaṇāyāṃ ca chāndogye
GSP33brsvbh3u:1355_0: evaṃ hi śrūyate-'vivā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya

GSP33brsvbh3u:1357: tatra saṃdehaḥ-kiṃ kālāparādhe yāgāntaramidaṃ codyata uta teṣveva karmasu
GSP33brsvbh3u:1359: eṣa tāvadatra viṣayaḥ-amāvāsyāyāmeva darśakarmārthaṃ vedikriyāgnipraṇayanakriyā vratādiśca yajamānasaṃskāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1362: yasya tu yajamānasya kutaścidbhramanibandhanāccaturdaśyāmevāmāvāsyābuddhau pravṛttaprayogasya candramā abhyudīyate tatredaṃ śrūyate-'yasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:1364: tena yajamānenābhyuditenāmāvāsyāyāmeva nimittādhikāraṃ parisamāpya purastadahareva vedyuddharaṇādikarma kṛtvā pratipadi darśaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1365: tatrābhyudaye kiṃ naimittikamidaṃ karmāntaraṃ darśāccodyata uta tasminneva darśakarmaṇi pūrvadevatāpanayanena devatāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1367_0: yadi hi pūrvadevatābhyo havīṃṣi vibhajediti śrūyate tatastānyeva havīṃṣi devatāntareṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:1367_1: yujyamānāni na karmāntaraṃ gamayitumarhanti kintu prakṛtameva karma taddhaviṣkamapanītapūrtadevatākaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1368_0: atra punastredhā taṇḍulān vibhajediti haviṣa eva madhyamādikrameṇa vibhāgaśravaṇādanapanītā

GSP33brsvbh3u:2037: tato rāgataḥ pravṛttamapyāyatyāṃ duḥkhato bibhyataṃ puruṣaṃ śaknoti nivārayitumiti balīyān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedho gārataḥ pravṛtteriti na tayā vikalpamarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2043_0: naca vācyaṃ yāvadyajatiṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇaṃ yāvadyajatisāmānyadvāreṇānuyājaṃ yajativiśeṣamupasarpati
GSP33brsvbh3u:2043_2: balavāniti yato bhavatvevaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2044: tatra takravidhirna dadhividhimapekṣate pravartitumiha tu prāptipūrvakatvāpratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya cānyato 'prāptestanniṣedhena
GSP33brsvbh3u:2046: naca sāpekṣatayā niṣedhādvidhireva balīyānityatulyaśiṣṭatayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasyaiva bādhanamiti sāṃprataṃ, tathā sati niṣedhaśāstraṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2052: na cātra tathā yeyajāmahābhāvaḥ, yajatiṣu yeyajāmahavidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2058: tenāṣṭādoṣaduṣṭo 'pi vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyānmā bhūtpramatagītateti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2060: evaṃ hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandho 'nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣvanuyājavartiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:2069: yathā hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoramūrtayoḥ kalpanaṃ nāñjasaṃ mūrtyanuvidhāyitvātkampasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2071: tasmādyatra vidhūnanamātraṃ śrutaṃ tatra kampanena varaṃ svakāryārambhāccālanamātrameva lakṣyatāṃ na tu tato 'pagatyānyatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:2075: kvacidapi cedvidhūnanaṃ tyāge vartate tathā satyanyatrāpi tatraiva vartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2076: evaṃ hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanamiha mukhyaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2090: śrutyarthau ca pāṭhakramādbalīyāṃsau, 'agnihotraṃ juhoti yavāgūṃ pacati'ityatra yathā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2094: taditi hi sarvanāma tasmādarthe sannihitaparāmarśakaṃ tasya hetubhāvamāha
GSP33brsvbh3u:2100: nahi tatra jīvanniti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2102: evañca na paryaṅkavidyātastatprakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2103: rāddhāntastu vidyāsāmarthyavidhūtakalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā gacchato brahmaprāptirna cāprakṣīṇakalmaṣasyottaramārgagamanaṃ saṃbhavati
GSP33brsvbh3u:2107: vidyaiva tādṛśī kalmaṣaṃ kṣapayati kṣapitakalmaṣaṃ cottaramārgaṃ prāpayatīti kathamardhapathe kalmaṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2109: nanu na pāṭhakramamātramatra, taditi sarvanāmaśrutyā saṃnihitaparāmarśādityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2110: tadayuktaṃ, buddhisaṃnidhānamātramatropayujyate nānyat, taccānantarasyeva vidyāprakaraṇādvidyāyā apīti samānā śrutirubhayatrāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2113: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūyeti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāraṃ brūte, naca paretasyāsti svātantryam, tasmāttadvirodhaḥ //27//
GSP33brsvbh3u:2117: nanu yathā paretasyottareṇa pathā brahmaprāptirbhavatīti vidyāphalamevaṃ tasyaivārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānirapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāpadāni tebhya uttaramidaṃ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2122: sukṛtaduṣkṛtaprakṣayastu satyapi naraśarīre saṃbhavatīti samarthasya hetoryamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ karyakṣayāyogādyukto jīvata eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣaya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2128: evaṃ kāraṇānantaraṃ kāryotpāde sati nimittanaimittakayostadbhāvasyopapattistāṇḍiśāṭhyāyaniśrutyośca saṃgatiritarathā svātantryābhāvenāsaṃgatiruktā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2130: ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte kathaṃ paratra saṃkrāmata iti śaṅkottaratayā sūtraṃ vyācakhyuḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2136_0: yathā hānisaṃnidhāvupāyanamanyatra śrutamiti, yatrāpi kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate tatrāpi
GSP33brsvbh3u:2136_1: upāyanamupasthāpayatyevaṃ tatsannidhāveva devayānaḥ panthāḥ śruta iti yatrāpi sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2139: tasmāddhānimātre devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyata iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2140: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūyanirañjanaḥ paramaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2141: sāmyamupaitīti hi viduṣo vidhūtapuṇyapāpasya vidyayā kṣemaprāptimāha /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2144: nahi jātu rajjau sarpabhramanivṛttaye samutpannaṃ rajjutattvajñānaṃ deśaviśeṣamapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2148: yadi paramārabdhakāryakarmakṣapaṇāya śarīrapātāvadhyapekṣeti na devayānenāstīhārtha iti śrutidṛṣṭavirodhānnāpekṣitavya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2149: asti tu paryaṅkavidyāyāṃ tasyārtha ityuktaṃ dvitīyena sūtreṇeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2150: ye tu yadi puṇyamapi nivartate kimarthā tarhi gatarityāśaṅkya sūtramavatārayanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2152: yadi punaḥ puṇyamanuvarteta brahmalokagatasyāpīha puṇyaphalopabhogāyavṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2154: tasmādduṣkṛtasyeva sukṛtasyāpi prakṣaya iti taiḥ punaranāśaṅkanīyamevāśaṅkitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2155: vidyākṣiptāyāṃ hi gatau keyamāśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇasukṛtaḥ kimarthamayaṃ yātīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2161: yadi tu tannādriyate tato darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādidharmāḥ saṃkīryeran /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2162: naca teṣāṃ vikṛtiṣu sauryādiṣu dvādaśāhādiṣu codakataḥ prāptiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2166: na caivaṃ sati śrutyādayo 'pi viniyojakāsteṣāmapi hi prakaraṇena
GSP33brsvbh3u:2168: yatrāpi vināprakaraṇaṃ śrutyādibhyo viniyogo 'vagamyate tatrāpi tannirvāhāya prakaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2170: tasmādyāsvevopāsanāsu devayānaḥ pitṛyāṇo vā panthā āmnātastāsveva na tūpāsanāntareṣu tadanāmnānāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:2171: naca 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate'iti sāmānyavacanātsarvavidyāsu tatpathaprāptiḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2172: śraddhātapaḥparāyaṇānāmeva tatra tatpathaprāptiḥ śrūyate, na tu vidyāparāyaṇānām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2173: apicaivaṃ satyekasyāṃ vidyāyāṃ mārgopadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsvityekatraiva mārgopadeśaḥ kartavyo na vidyāntare /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2176: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate'iti na śraddhātapomātrasya pathiprāptimāhāpi tu vidyayā tadārohantītyatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:2177_0: nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti kevalasya tapasaḥ śraddhāyāśca tatprāptipratiṣedhādvidyāsahite
GSP33brsvbh3u:2177_1: śraddhātapasī tatprāpyupāyatayā vadan vidyāntarīlānāmapi pañcāgnividyāvidbhiḥ samānamārgatāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2178: tathānyatrāpi pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'bhidhīyate-'ya evametādvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2185: etaduktaṃ bhavati-bhavetprakaraṇaṃ niyāmakaṃ yadyaniyamapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ vā na syādasti tu tattasya ca prakaraṇādbalīyastvam
GSP33brsvbh3u:2186: tasmādaniyamo vidyāntareṣvapi saguṇeṣu devayānaḥ panthā asakṛnmārgopadeśasya ca prayojanaṃ varṇitaṃ bhāṣyakṛteti //31//

GSP33brsvbh3u:2200: yena hi karmaṇā vasiṣṭhādīnāmārabdhaṃ śarīraṃ tatpratīkṣā syāt /

GSP33brsvbh3u:2211: nirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmapavargalakṣaṇaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na stutimātratayā vyākhyāyamucitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2215: naca viduṣāmapāntaratamaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ tattaddehasaṃtārātsatyāmapi brahmavidyāyāmanirmokṣānna brahmavidyā mokṣasya heturiti sāmpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2216: hetorapi sati pratibandhe kāryānupajano na hetubhāvamapakāroti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2217: nahi vṛntaphalasaṃyogapratibaddhaṃ gurutvaṃ na patanamajījanaditi pratibandhāpagame tatkurvanna taddhetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2218: naca na setupratibandhānāmapāṃ nimnadeśānabhisarpaṇamiti setubhede na nimnamabhisarpanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2219: tadvadihāpi vidyākarmārādhanāvarjiteśvaravihitādhikārapadapratibaddhā brahmavidyā yadyapi na muktiṃ dattavatī tathāpi tatparisamāptau pratibandhavigame dāsyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2220: yathā hi prārabdhavipākasya karmaṇaḥ prakṣayaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaścaramadehasamutpannabrahmasākṣātkāro 'pi dhriyate 'tha
GSP33brsvbh3u:2227: yo hi paravaśo dehaṃ parityājyate dehāntaraṃ ca nītaḥ pūrvajanmānubhūtasya smarati sa janmavāñjātismaraśca
GSP33brsvbh3u:2228: gṛhādiva gṛhāntare svecchayā kāyāntaraṃ saṃcaramāṇo na jātismara ākhyāyate /

GSP33brsvbh3u:2247: apica svargādāvanubhavapathamanārohati śabdaikasamadhigamye vicikitsā syādapi mandadhiyāmāmuṣmikaphalatvaṃ prati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2248: yathā cārthavādaḥ-'ko hi tadveda yadamuṣmiṃlloke 'sti vā na veti' /

GSP33brsvbh3u:2253: nanu tattvamasi vartasa iti vākyaṃ kathamanubhavameva dyotayatītyata āha-

GSP33brsvbh3u:2259: ānandādayaḥ pradhānasyetyatrāyamartho yadyapi bhāvarūpeṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu siddhastantryāyatayā ca niṣedharūpeṣviti siddha eva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2263: yadyapi śābare dattottaramatrodāharaṇāntaraṃ tathāpi tulyanyāyatayaidapi śakyamudāhartumityudāharaṇāntaraṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2266: tadaṅgatvena yajurveda eva 'ya evaṃ vidvānvāravantīyaṃ gāyati ya evaṃ vidvānyajñāyajñīyaṃ gāyati ya evaṃ vidvānvāmadevyaṃ gāyati'iti vihitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2268_1: prayoktavyānyatha yatra viniyujyante tatratyenopāṃśutvena svareṇa 'uccaiḥ sāmnopāṃśu
GSP33brsvbh3u:2270: utpattividhinaivāpekṣitopāyatvātmanā vihitatvādaṅganāṃ tasyaiva prāthamyāttannibandhana evoccaiḥsvare prāpta ucyate-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2273_1: copāṃśutvaṃ so 'yaṃ virodho vyatikramastasminvayatikrame mukhyena pradhānena niyujyamānatvarūpeṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:2279: ekasyaiva vidherutpattiviniyogādhikāraprayogarūpeṣu caturṣu madhye kiñcideva rūpaṃ kenacidvākyenollikhyate yadanyato 'prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2280: tatra yadyapi sāmavede sāmāni vihitāni tathāpi tadvākyānāṃ tadutpattimātraparatā viniyogasya yājurvaidikaireva vākyai prāptatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2281_1: bhavantīti tatra yena vākyena viniyujyante tasyaiva svarasya sādhanatvaṃsaṃsparśino
GSP33brsvbh3u:2283: udrātṛvedotpannānāṃ mantraṇāmudgātrā prayoge prāpte adhvaryupradānake 'pi puroḍāśe viniyuktatvātpradhānānurodhenādhvaryuṇaiva teṣāṃ prayogo nodgātreti dārṣṭāntike yojayati-
GSP33brsvbh3u:2288: ekatra bhoktrabhoktrorvedyatā, anyatra bhoktroreveti vedyabhedādvidyābheda iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2293: saṃdehe hi vākyaśeṣānnirṇayo naca mukhyalākṣaṇikagrahaṇaviṣayo viṣayaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2295: prakaraṇasya ca tato balīyasā vākyena bādhanāt /

GSP33brsvbh3u:2297: pibantāviti dvayoḥ pibantā yā sā bādhanīyā, sā copakramopasaṃhārānurodhena na dvayorapi tu chatrinyāyena lākṣāṇikī vyākhyeyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2298: yena hyupakramyate yena copasaṃsthiyate tadanurodhena madhyaṃ jñeyam /

GSP33brsvbh3u:2300: pṛthagvidhitvamalabhamānā vidhitvamavivakṣitvārthavādatayā nītāstatkasya hetorekavākyatā hi sādhīyasī vākyabhedāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2303: apica triṣvapyeteṣu vedānteṣu prakaraṇatraye 'pi paurvāparyaparyālocanayā paramātmavidyaivāvagamyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:2306: nāsyāṃ jīvaḥ pratipādyate kintu paramātmano 'bhedaṃ jīvasya darśayitumasāvanūdyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2311: kauṣītakeyakaholacākrāyaṇoṣastapraśnopakramayorvidyornairantaryeṇāmnātayoḥ kimasti bhedo na veti viśaye bheda eveti bhrūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2312: kutaḥ-yadyapyubhayatra praśnottarayorabhedaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi tatsyaivaikasya punaḥ

GSP33brsvbh3u:2319: tathāpyekatra tasyaivāśanāyādimātrātyayopādherupāsanādekatra ca kāryakaraṇavirahopādherupāsanādvidyābheda eveti prāpte pratyucyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2323: vastusvarūpaṃ tu punaḥpunarucyamānamapi na doṣamāvahati śatakṛtvo 'pi hi pathyaṃ vadantyāptāḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2328: ubhābhyāmapi vidyābhyāṃ bhinna ātmā pratipādyate iti yo manyate pūrvapakṣaikadeśī taṃ prati sarvāntaratvavirodho darśitaḥ //35//
GSP33brsvbh3u:2337: evaṃ hi nikṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭo bhavatīti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2345: nanvevamutkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭatvaprasaṅga ityuktaṃ tatkimidānīṃ saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne 'sya vastuto nirguṇasya nikṛṣṭatā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2346: kasmaicitphalāya tathā dhyānamātraṃ vidhīyate na tvasya nikṛṣṭatāmāpādayatīti cedihāpi vyatihārānucintanamātramupadiśyate phalāya na tu nikṛṣṭatā bhavatyutkṛṣṭasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2351_0: tadvai tadetadeva tadāsa satyameva sa yo haitanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ vedaṃ satyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2351_1: brahmeti jayatīmāṃllokāñjita ityasāvasadya evametanmahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda satyaṃ

GSP33brsvbh3u:2362: kiñca jito vaśīkṛta inuśabda itthaṃśabdasyārthe vartate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2370: kasmiṃnnālambane tadupāsanīyamityata uttaram-sa ādityo ya eṣa ityādinā tasyopaniṣadaharahamiti
GSP33brsvbh3u:2371: hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ vedetyantena /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2379: tathāca śrutiḥ-'tadetadakṣaraṃ satyamiti sa ityekamakṣaraṃ tītyekamakṣaraṃ yamityekamakṣaraṃ prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ madhyato 'nṛtaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2380: tadetadanṛmubhayataḥ satyena parigṛhītaṃ satyabhūyameva bhavati naivaṃvidvāṃsamanṛtaṃ hinasti'iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:2383: atra hi prathamottame akṣare satyaṃ mṛtyurūpābhāvāt /

GSP33brsvbh3u:2869: nanu yathā pratyayābhidheyāyā apūrvabhāvanāyā ājānato bhedabhāve 'pi
GSP33brsvbh3u:2875: iha brahmaṇaḥ siddharūpatvādguṇānāmapi satyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ tadāśrayāṇāṃ siddhatayā sarvatrābhedo vidyāsu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2876: nahi viśālavakṣāścakorekṣaṇaḥ kṣatriyayuvā duścayavanadharmeti ekatropadiṣṭo 'nyatra siṃhāsyo vṛṣaskandhaḥ sa
GSP33brsvbh3u:2877: evopadiśyamānaścakorekṣaṇatvādyapajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśaṃ vastu bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2882: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi vastuniṣṭhānyupāsanavākyāni kintu
GSP33brsvbh3u:2887: yathaikaḥ strīkāyaḥ kenacidbhakṣyatayā kenacidupagantavyatayā kenacidapatyatayā kenacinmātṛtayā kenacidupekṣaṇīyatayā viṣayīkriyamāṇaḥ puruṣecchātantraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2897: vidyābhede tu na paunaruktyamekasyāṃ vidyāyāmuktā vidyāntare noktā iti vidyāntarasyāpi tadguṇatvāya vaktavyā anuktānāmaprāpteriti //58//
GSP33brsvbh3u:2900: agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu pṛthagadhikārāṇāmapi samuccayo dṛṣṭo niyamavāṃsteṣāṃ nityatvādupāsanāstu kāmyatayā na nityāstasmānnāsāṃ samuccayaniyamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2901: tena samānaphalānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādīnāmiva na niyamavānvikalpaḥ phalabhūmārthinaḥ samuccayasyāpi saṃbhavāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2904: upāsanāntarābhyāse ca cittaikāgratāvyāghātena kasya cidupāsanāniṣpatteriha vikalpa eva niyamavāniti rāddhāntaḥ //59//
GSP33brsvbh3u:2906: kāmyās tu yathākāmaṃ samuccīyeran na vā pūrvahetvabhāvāt |
GSP33brsvbh3u:2907: yāsūpāsanāsu vinopāsyasākṣātkāraṇamadṛṣṭenaiva kāmyasādhanaṃ tāsāṃ kāmyadarśapaurṇamāsādivatpuruṣecchāvaśena vikalpasamuccayāviti sāmpratam //60//
GSP33brsvbh3u:2911: iha tu satyapi puruṣārthatve kasmānnaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti pūrvoktamarthamākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2912: yadyapi hi kāmyā etā upāsanāstathāpi na svatantrā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2913: tathā sati hi kratvarthānāśritatayā kratuprayogādbahirapyamūṣāṃ prayogaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2916: evaṃ cāśrayatantratvādāśritānāṃ prayogavacanenāśrayāṇāṃ samuccayaniyamenāśritānāmapi samuccayaniyamo yukta itarathā tadāśritatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2917: sa ca prayogavacana upāsanāḥ samuccinvaṃstattatphalakāmanānāmavaśyaṃbhāvamākṣipati tadabhāve tāsāṃ samuccayaniyamābhāvāditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2922: nahi kāmā vidhīyante yena samuccīyerannapi tūddiśyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2926: nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt satyapi tadāśrayāṇāṃ nityatve idameva cāśrayatantratvamāśritānāṃ yadāśraye satyeva vṛttirnāsatīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2927: na tu tatra vṛttireva nāvṛttiriti tadidamuktam-āśrayatantrāṇyapi hīti
GSP33brsvbh3u:2934: vedāntarohitapraṇavodgīthaikatvapratyayasāmarthyāddhotṛkarmaṇaḥ śaṃsanādudgātā pratisamādadhāti kiṃ tadityata āha durudgīthamapi vedāntarodite caudgātre karmaṇi utpannaṃ kṣatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2944: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsvbh3u:2949: samprati tu kimaupaniṣadātmatattvajñānamapavargasādhanatayā puruṣārthamāho kratuprayogāpekṣitakartṛpratipādakatayā kratvarthamiti mīmāṃsāmahe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2950_0: yadā ca kratvarthaṃ tadā yāvanmātraṃ kratuprayogavidhināpekṣitaṃ kartṛtvamāmuṣmikaphalopabhoktṛtvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2950_1: ca na caitadanityatve ghaṭate kṛtavipraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgādato nityatvamapi,
GSP33brsvbh3u:2953_0: yadyapi jīvānuvādena tasya brahmatvapratipādanaparatvamupaniṣadāmiti mahatā prabandhena
GSP33brsvbh3u:2953_1: tatra tatra pratipāditaṃ tathāpyatra keṣāñcitpūrvapakṣaśaṅkābījānāṃ nirākaraṇe tadeva
GSP33brsvbh3u:2955_0: yadyapi ca kartṛmātraṃ nāvyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ kartṛmātrasya laukikeṣvapi karmasu
GSP33brsvbh3u:2955_3: vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate na tādṛśasyāsti laukikeṣu karmasūpayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2957_0: āmuṣmikaphalānāṃ tu vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tamantareṇāsaṃbhavāttatsaṃbandha evāyamaupaniṣadaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:2960: vidyāvācchraddhāvānkratuprayogāṅgaṃ nānyathā prokṣitā iva vrīhayaḥ kratvaṅgamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2961: priyādisūcitasya ca saṃsāriṇa evātmano draṣṭavyatvena pratijñāpanādapahatapāpmatvādi tu tadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasyaiva stutyartham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2967: na tvetatprakṛtodgīthavidyāviṣayaṃ yadeva vidyayeti sarvanāmāvadhāraṇābhyāṃ vyāpteradhigamat
GSP33brsvbh3u:2968: yathā ya eva dhūmavāndeśaḥ sa vahnimāniti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2969: samanvārambhavacanaṃ ca phalārambhe vidyākarmaṇoḥ sāhityaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2970: tacca yadyapyāpneyādiyāgaṣaṭkavatsamapradhānatvenāpi bhavati tathāpyuktayā yuktyā vidyāyāḥ karma pratyaṅgabhāvenaiva netavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2989: yadi śarīrādyatiriktaḥ kartā bhoktātmetyetanmatra upaniṣadaḥ paryavasitāḥ syustataḥ syādevaṃ, na tvetadasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2992: tathā caupaniṣadātmajñānasya kratvanuṣṭhānavirodhinaḥ kratusaṃbandha eva nāsti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2995: ata eva priyādisūcitena saṃsāriṇātmanopakramya tasyaivātmano 'dhikopadidīkṣāyāṃ paramātmanātyantābheda upadiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:2996: yathā samāropitasya bhujagasya rajjurūpādatyantābhedaḥ pratipādyate yo
GSP33brsvbh3u:3005: yatha sarve brāhmaṇā bhojyantāmiti nimantritāpekṣayā teṣāmeva prakṛtatvāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:3009: avibhāge 'pi na doṣa ityāha-na cedaṃ samanvārambhavacanamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3015: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadadhyayanamarthāvabodhaparyantaṃ karmasūpayujyate yathā karmavidhivākyānāṃ tanmātravata evādhikāraḥ karmasu
GSP33brsvbh3u:3017: adhyayanamātravata eveti mātragrahaṇenārthajñānaṃ vā vyavacchinnamiti manvāno bhrāntaścodayati-nanvevaṃ satīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3028: apica vidyāphalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayantī śrutiḥ kālāntarabhāviphalakarmāṅgatvaṃ vidyāyā nirākarotītyāha-kāmakāreṇa caike /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3043: nindati hi pratyakṣā śrutirāśramāntaraṃ 'vīrahā vā eṣa devānām'ityādikā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3044: pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe ca smṛtyācārayoraprāmāṇyamuktaṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam'iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:3049: na kevalamanyaparatayā parāmarśasyāśramāntaraṃ na labhyate api tvāśramāntaranindādvāreṇāpavādādapītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3052: ye ceme 'raṇya ityādibhyastvāśramāntaraṃ setasyatītyata āha-ye ceme 'raṇya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3056: nahi tapa eva dvitīya ityatrāśramāntarābhidhāyī kaścidasti śabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3057: nanvetameva pravrājina iti vacanādāśramāntaraṃ setsyatītyata āha-tathaitameveti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3068: tatra skandhaśabdo yadyāśramaparo na syādapi tu samūhavacanastato dharmāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ prātisvikotpattīnāṃ kimapekṣya tritvasaṅkhyā suvyavasthāpyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3070: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho brahmacārīti dvitīyastapa iti ca, tapaḥpradhānāttu vānaprasthāśramānnānyaḥ, brahmasaṃstha iti ca
GSP33brsvbh3u:3072: tasmādanyaparādapi parāmarśādaśramāntarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatādhikaraṇanyāyena na śakyante 'pākartum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3073: naca pratyakṣaśrutivirodho vīrahā vetyādeḥ pratipannagārhasthyaṃ pramādādajñānādvāgnimudvāsayituṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3074: evañca avirodhe siddhavatparāmarśādaśramāntarāṇāṃ śāstrāntarasiddhiṃ vā kalpayiṣyāmo yathopavītavidhipare vākye 'upavyayate devalakṣmameva
GSP33brsvbh3u:3075: tatkurute'ityatra nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṛṇāmiti śāstrāntarasiddhayornivītaprācīnāvītayoḥ parāmarśa iti //19//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3080: tathāpyāśramāntarāṇāṃ pūrvasiddherabhāvātparāmarśānupapatteḥ, aparāmarśe ca stuterasaṃbhavena kiṃparatayā ekavākyatāstvitī tāṃ bhaṅktvā dhāraṇavadvaramapūrvatvādvidhirevāstu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3092: yadi tāvadbrahmasaṃstha iti padaṃ pratyastamitāvayavārthaṃ parivrājake
GSP33brsvbh3u:3099: evañca caturṣvāśrameṣu yasyaiva brahmaṇi niṣṭhatvamāśramiṇaḥ sa brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3100: tatra tāvadbrahmacārigṛhasthau svaśabdābhihitau tapaḥpadena ca tapaḥpradhānatayā bhikṣuvānaprasthāvupasthāpitau
GSP33brsvbh3u:3103: yadi tāvatkarmayogaḥ karmitā sā bhikṣorapi kāyavāṅmanobhirasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3104: atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāmārthitayā te karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3105: tathā sati gṛhasthādayo 'pi brahmārpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3106: tasmādbrahmaṇi tātparyaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatā na tu karmatyāgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3108: tapasā ca dvayorāśramayorekīkaraṇena traya iti tritvamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3109: evañca trayo 'pyāśramā abrahmasaṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇyalokabhājo bhavanti yaḥ punareteṣu brahmasaṃsthaḥ so 'mṛtatvabhāgiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3111: yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3113: tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3114: yathā āgneyyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata ityatra viniyuktāpi prakṛtaivāgneyī gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3116: yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3118: iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3124: tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3128: yatsaṃkhyākāśca ye prasiddhāste tatsaṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti cocitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3130: aśādhāraṇenaikaikena lakṣaṇenaikeka āśramo vaktumupakrānta iti tathaiva samāpanamucitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3132: naca tapo nāma nāsādhāraṇaṃ vānaprasthānāmityata āha-tapaścāsādhāraṇa iti
GSP33brsvbh3u:3133: na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ satyapyaṣṭagrāsādiniyame
GSP33brsvbh3u:3134: naca śaucasantoṣaśamadamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3140: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3141: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3142: eta iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3143: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3150: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3151: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūtpramādapāṭha ityaprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3153: eṣa hi brahmasaṃsthatālakṣaṇo dharmo bhikṣorasādhāraṇa āśramāntarāṇi tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3154: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3157: brahmasaṃsthatvamasādhāraṇaṃ parivrājakadharmaṃ śrutirādarśayatītyāha-tathāca nyāsa iti brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3158: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha-brahmā hi paraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3160: kimapekṣya paraḥ saṃnyāsa ityata āha-tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3162: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3169: vidhivyabhicāritatadvidhisaṃbandhenodgīthenopasthāpitaḥ sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3179: tenaikavākyatānupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tūpāsanāvidheḥ kiṃ viṣayasamarpaṇenopayujyatāmuta stutyeti viśaye viṣayasamarpaṇena yathārthavattvaṃ naivaṃ stutyā bahiraṅgatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3191: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:3195: evaṃ daṇḍī bhaveddaṇḍinā bhavitavyaṃ daṇḍinā bhūyetetyekadhātvarthaviṣayā vidhyupahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3197: yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3207_0: naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ prātisvikaviniyogāttatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:3207_1: tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogo na virudhyate tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi
GSP33brsvbh3u:3208: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānāṃ viniyogānāṃ samudāyaviniyogasya ca tulyabalatvādiha tu saṃnidhānāt śruterbalīyastvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3211: kintu pāriplavamācakṣītetyupakramya yānyāmnātāni manurvaivasvato rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ, tānyeva hi pāriplavena viśeṣitāni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3215: yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimantritāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3216: tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so 'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3217: pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā tantropākhyāyikayeti //23//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3222: vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya kraturapekṣitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3224: yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:3232: yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:3242: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3243: tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3244: te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyāṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3245: sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3246: tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3247: tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām
GSP33brsvbh3u:3248: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā
GSP33brsvbh3u:3251: yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3257: sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥkhānātmani saṃsāre sati nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:3259: ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3262: tato hānopāyaṃ paryeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti śāstrādācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti karmāṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3263: vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3266: yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3273: ataśca 'bhrāntyā cellaukikaṃ karma vaidikaṃ ca tathāstu te'iti pralāpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3275: upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3276: tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3279: śamadamādyupetas syāt tathāpi tu tadvidhes tadaṅgatayā teṣām apy avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt |
GSP33brsvbh3u:3283: eṣa kila vicāraviṣayaḥ-sarvāṇi khalu vāgādīnyavajitya prāṇo mukhya uvācaitāni kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tāni hocuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3284: yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ tattavānnamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3285: tadanena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvamannamityanucintanaṃ vidhāyāha śrutiḥ-'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3287: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimetatsarvānnābhyanujñānaṃ śamādivadetadvidyāṅgatayā vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3288: tatra yadyapi bhavatīti vartamānāpadeśānna vidhiḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3289: tathāpi yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti vartamānāpadeśādapi palāśamayītvavidhipratipattiḥ pañcamalakārāpattyā tathehāpi pravṛttiviśeṣakaratālābhe vidhipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3290: stutau hi arthavādamātraṃ na tathārthavadyathā vidhau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3291: bhakṣyābhakṣyaśāstraṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pravṛttamanena viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:3295: na tāvatkauleyakamaryādamannaṃ manuṣyajātinā yugapatparyāyeṇa vā śakyamattum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3297: na cātra liṅga iva sphuṭatarā vidhipratipattirasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3300: naca satyāṃ gatau sāmānyataḥ pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣayasaṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3303: prāṇātyaya iti cāvadhāraṇaparaṃ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnatvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3304: tatropākhyānācca sphuṭataravidhismṛteśca surāvarjaṃ vidvāṃsamavidvāṃsaṃ prati vidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3312_0: kāmo ma udakapānamiti svātantryaṃ me udakapāne nadīkūpataḍāgaprāpādiṣu yathākāmaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3312_1: prāpnomīti nocchiṣṭodakābhāve prāṇātyaya iti tatrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇadoṣa iti maṭacīhateṣu
GSP33brsvbh3u:3327: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-siddhe hi syādvirodho 'yaṃ na tu sādhye kathañcana
GSP33brsvbh3u:3330: na tu sādhyarūpaṃ yathā ṣoḍaśina ekasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3334: nityehitopāttaduritaprakṣayaprayojanamavaśyakartavyaṃ, vidyāṅgatayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācitkatayānavaśyaṃ bhāve 'pi 'kāmyo vā naimittiko vā
GSP33brsvbh3u:3335: nityamarthaṃ vikṛtya niviśate'iti nyāyādanityādhikāreṇa niviśamānamapi na
GSP33brsvbh3u:3338: sahakāritvaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ na kārye vidyāyāḥ kiṃ tūtpattau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3341: yathā 'sahaiva daśabhiḥ pūtrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī'iti sātsveva daśaputreṣu saiva bhārasya vāhiketi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3346: catasṛṇāmapi ca pratipattīnāṃ brahmaṇi vidhānānupapatterityuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3347: draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhisarūpaṃ na vidhirityapyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3350: naca svaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3356: yathā māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatīti prakaraṇāntarātkarmabheda evamihāpi 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti
GSP33brsvbh3u:3358: ivyavacchede sati karmāntaramiti prāpta ucyate-satyapi prakaraṇāntare tadeva karma, śruteḥ smṛteśca saṃyogabhedaḥ paraṃ yathā 'agnihotraṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3362: kintu ajñātajñāpanasvaraso vidhiḥ prakaraṇaikye sphuṭatarapratyabhijñābalena svarasaṃ jahyāt
GSP33brsvbh3u:3364: iha tu siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuñjāno na juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3368: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3369: iha tu vividiṣāyāṃ vidhiśrutiḥ na yajñādau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3376: yadi vidyāsahakārīṇyāśramakarmāṇi hanta bho vidhurādīnāmanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidyāyām,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3386: yadyapi ceha janmani karmāṇyananuṣṭhitāni tathāpi vividiṣātiśayadarśanātprāci bhave 'nuṣṭhitāni tairiti gamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3387: nanu yathādhītaveda eva dharmajijñāsāyāmadhikriyate nānadhītaveda iha janmani /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3388: tatheha janmanyāśramakarmotpāditavividiṣa eva vidyāyāmadhikṛto netara ityanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidhuraprabhṛtīnāmityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3401: daivātpunaḥ patnyādiviyogātaḥ satyanāśramitve bhavedadhikāro vidyāyāmiti śrutismṛtisaṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñenetyādinā jyāyastvāvagateḥ śrutiliṅgātsmṛtiliṅgāccāvagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3402: tenaiti puṇyakṛditi śrutiliṅgam, anāśramī na tiṣṭhetetyādi ca smṛtiliṅgam //39//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3404: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ |
GSP33brsvbh3u:3410: abhāvaṃ śiṣṭācārābhāvaṃ vibhajate-na caivamācārāḥ śiṣṭā iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3414: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmīti naiṣṭhikaṃ prati prāyaścittābhāvasmaraṇānnairṛtagardabhālambhaḥ prāyaścittamupakurvāṇakaṃ prati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3415: tasmācchinnaśirasa iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyābhāva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3420: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam |
GSP33brsvbh3u:3424: tasyāmapi ca sākṣātprāyaścittaṃ na kartavyamiti prāyaścittaniṣedho na
GSP33brsvbh3u:3425: gamyate, na paśyāmīti tu darśanābhāvena so 'numātavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3426: tathā ca smṛtirniṣedhārtheti anumāya tadarthā śrutiranumātavyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3433: śāstrasthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstramūlatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3438: yadi naiṣṭhikādīnāmasti prāyaścittaṃ tatkimetaiḥ kṛtanirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyamuta neti
GSP33brsvbh3u:3439: tatra doṣakṛtatvādasaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tannibarhaṇādanibarhaṇo vā tatkaraṇavaiyarthyātsaṃvyavahāryā eveti prāpta ucyate-bahistūbhayathāpi
GSP33brsvbh3u:3441: niṣiddhakarmānuṣṭhānajanyameno lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhimāpādayati dvaidham kasyacidenaso lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhirapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3442: kasyācittu paralokāśuddhimātramapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇairihalokāśuddhistvenasāpāditā na śakyāpanetum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3446: bālaghnādistu kṛtanirṇejano 'pi vacanādavyavahārya iha loke jāyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3451: prathame kāṇḍe śeṣalakṣaṇe tathākāma ityatrartviksaṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kiṃ kāmo yājamāna utārtvijya iti saṃśayyārtvijye 'pi karmaṇi yājamāna eva
GSP33brsvbh3u:3452: kāmo guṇaphaleṣviti nirṇītamiha tvevañjātīyakāni cāṅgasaṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kiṃ yājamānanyevotārtvijyānīti vicāryata iti na punaruktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3453_2: vacane yajamānasya phalavadupāsanaṃ tasya phalaśruteḥ taṃ ha bako dālbhyo vidāñcakāretyāderupāsanasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:3454: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate |
GSP33brsvbh3u:3457: na cartvikkartṛka upāsane yajamānagāmitā phalasyāsaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrītastadgāmino phalāya ghaṭate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3464: labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3465: yatra hi vidhivibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3466: bālyena tiṣṭhāsedityatra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3473: tasmādbālyamevātra vidhīyate maunaṃ tu prāptaṃ praśaṃsārthamanūdyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3475: api tu jñānamātraṃ pāṇḍityaṃ jñānātiśayasaṃpattistu maunaṃ tatraiva tatprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3477: tasmādapūrvatvānmaunasya bālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidhīyate
GSP33brsvbh3u:3478: evaṃ ca nirvedanīyatvamapi vidhāna āñjasaṃ syādityāha-nirvedanīyatvanirdeśāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3479: kasyedaṃ maunaṃ vidhīyate vidyāsahakāritayetyata āha-tadvato vidyāvataḥ saṃnyāsinobhikṣoḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3487: api tu vidyodayāyābhyāso pravṛtto na punarutpannavidyātiśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3490: ata eva samidādirvidhyantaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhānavidheḥ paścāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3497: chāndogye bahulāyāsasādhyakarmabahulatvādgārhasthyasya cāśramāntaradharmāṇāṃ ca keṣāñcidahiṃsādīnāṃ samavāyāttenopasaṃhāro na punastena samāpanādityarthaḥ //48//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3499: evaṃ tadāśramadvayopanyāsena kvacitkadāciditarābhāvaśaṅkā mandabuddheḥ syāditi tadapākaraṇārthaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:3507: evaṃ ca śāstrāntarābādhenāpyupapattau na śāstrāntarabādhanamanyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //50//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3511: kiṃ śravaṇādibhirihaiva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate utāniyama iha vāmutra veti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3512: yadyapi karmāṇi yajñādīnyaniyataphalāni teṣāṃ ca vidyotpādasādhanatvena vidyotpādasyāniyamaḥ pratibhāti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3518: naca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikamapi cirabhāvinaṃ pramotpādaṃ kāmayante kintu tādātvikameva prāgeva tu pāralaukikam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3519: nahi kumbhalādidṛkṣuścakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kālāntarīyāya kumbhadarśanāya kintu tādātvikāya
GSP33brsvbh3u:3521: śrutismṛtī ca pāralaukikaṃ vidyotpādaṃ stutyā brūtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3524_0: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yata evātra vidyotpāde śravaṇādibhiḥ kartavye yajñādīnāṃ sattvaśuddhidvāreṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:3524_1: vā vighnopaśamadvārā vopayogo 'ta eva teṣāṃ yajñādīnāṃ karmāntarapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmaniyataphalatvena
GSP33brsvbh3u:3526: tathāca teṣāṃ yajñādyapekṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ cāniyataphalatvena śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ yuktamevaṃ śrutismṛtipratibandho na stutimātratvena vyākhyeyo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3527: puruṣāśca vidyārthinaḥ sādhanasāmarthyānusāreṇa tadanurūpameva kāmayiṣyante tadidamuktam-abhisaṃdherniraṅkuśatvāditi
GSP33brsvbh3u:3531: tathā ca yathā sādhanotkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalasya vidyāyā utkarṣanikarṣāvevaṃ vidyāphalasyāpi mukterutkarṣanikarṣau saṃbhāvyete /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3532: naca muktāvaihikāmuṣmikatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapadyate brahmopāsanāparipākalabdhajanmani vidyāyāṃ jīvato mukteravaśyaṃbhāvaniyamātsatyapyārabdhavipākakarmāprakṣaye /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3534_1: mukterapi vidyāphalatvādrūpataścotkarṣanikarṣau syātāmiti prāpata ucyate-na muktestatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:3535: naca muktirbrahmaṇo nityasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3537: 1-virodhikāryodaya eva pūrvapradhvasaṃ iti matamāśritya kleśādikṣayo vidyājanmeti sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GSP33brsvbh3u:3540: naca cirācirotpādānutpādāvantareṇa vidyāyāmapi rūpato bhedaḥ kaścidupalakṣyate tasyā apyekarūpatvena śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3542: na cātra vidyātvaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3544: tasmāttasyā muktyavasthāyā aikarūpyāvadhṛtermuktilakṣaṇasya phalasyāviśeṣo yukta iti //52//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3545: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
